articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Study finds how specific T cells in brain slow progression of Alzheimer’s disease - Devdiscourse
articles.description: Up to 5.8 million Americans currently suffer from Alzheimer's disease, a neurological ailment marked by a progressive deterioration in cognitive function, including memory loss.
